description: Procurement of decontaminating agent for delivery at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement ##

**Solicitation Reference:** PW-22-01004488

**Publication Date:** 17 August 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** 26 September 2022 14:00

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of Decontaminating Agents to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Items Required:**
1. Decontaminating Agent (GSIN: N6850, NSN: 20-010-6684)
	* Part Number: BLM-RP-00125-C
	* Quantity: 300 units per location
	* Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
2. Decontaminating Agent (GSIN: N6850, NSN: 20-010-6684)
	* Part Number: BLM-RP-00125-C
	* Quantity: 300 units per location
	* Unit of Issue: Each (EA)

### Tender Conditions
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Offers submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Canadian Content: The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA).
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information
* Jean-Pierre Normandin, 
	+ Email: [jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 819-939-3674
* Directorate Maritime Procurement
	+ 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2

### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website:
* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/deb3490ef5b424a87d5ddee9a67d21aa/rfp_w8482-230726-a-en.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/17/06511ba503c93f557d422f709ca52067/rfp_w8482-230726-a-fr.pdf>

### Notes
The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
